person.persName: Richard Oglesby (Illinois governor, Union colonel/major general)

body.p: Illinois, governor. Floydsburg, Kentucky, native. Served as 1st lieutenant in the 4th Illinois Infantry in the Mexican-American war in 1846. Graduate of Louisville Law School in 1848. Senator for Illinois in 1860. Served in the 8th Illinois Infantry as colonel from April 25, 1861. Served as brigadier general and major general from March 21, 1862. Governor of Illinois from January 16, 1865, to January 11, 1869.
